word: "ONE EVENING, AFTER MEDITATING UPON THE AFFLICTIONS OF BROTHER AND SISTER WHITE, THEIR CONNECTION WITH THE WORK OF THE THIRD ANGEL'S MESSAGE, AND MY OWN FAILURE TO STAND BY THEM IN THEIR AFFLICTION; AND AFTER TRYING TO CONFESS MY WRONGS TO THE LORD, AND IMPLORING HIS BLESSING UPON BROTHER AND SISTER WHITE, I RETIRED TO REST.
